member.name: CATEGORYINFO_FLAGS
member.summary: Provides a set of flags for use with the structure.

member.name: CATEGORYINFO_FLAGS.CATINFO_NORMAL
member.summary: 0x00000000. Applies default properties for the category.

member.name: CATEGORYINFO_FLAGS.CATINFO_COLLAPSED
member.summary: 0x00000001. The category should appear as collapsed

member.name: CATEGORYINFO_FLAGS.CATINFO_HIDDEN
member.summary: 0x00000002. The category should appear as hidden.

member.name: CATEGORYINFO_FLAGS.CATINFO_EXPANDED
member.summary: 0x00000004. The category should appear as expanded.

member.name: CATEGORYINFO_FLAGS.CATINFO_NOHEADERCOUNT
member.summary: 0x00000020. The count of items in the category should not be displayed in the header.

member.name: CATEGORYINFO_FLAGS.CATINFO_SUBSETTED
member.summary: 0x00000040. Windows 7 and later. The category should appear subsetted.
